name: Chicken Labyrinth Puzzles
description: Guide the lost chicken through mazes and solve puzzles to get home.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 Processor: Dual Core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated 512MB graphic card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated
recommended_requirements: OS: Win 7 Processor: Quad Core 2.4 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB Radeon 5000 series DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated
